articles.description: The selloff follows a wild year when the precious metals soared as if they were meme stocks or the hot new tech darling.

articles.author: Christine Idzelis, Vivien Lou Chen, Joy Wiltermuth, Jules Rimmer
articles.title: Stock Market on Jan. 30, 2026: Dow, S&P 500 and Nasdaq end lower Friday after Trump picks Warsh for Fed chair and investors weigh inflation report; tech under pressure as Dow books another weekly loss; U.S. stocks score monthly gains - MarketWatch
articles.description: Major U.S. stock benchmarks closed in the red Friday, as investors weighed President Trump's selection of Kevin Warsh as his nominee to chair the Federal Reserve. Still, the Dow, S&P 500 and Nasdaq finished January with gains.
